characters.name: Nadia Iamavich
characters.description: A for-hire exorcist and paranormal investigator. Often does investigation work for the Knights Templar.

characters.name: "Jim"
characters.description: A creature sealed within Nadia after a botched exorcism.

characters.name: Nikail Iamavich
characters.description: Nadia's cousin. Recently returned from overseas with 75% of her previous total arm mass.

characters.name: Malcolm Benedict
characters.description: Chief Security Officer of Sera Corp

characters.description: Chief Science Officer of Sera Corp

characters.name: Agent Jackson "Jax" McCormick
characters.description: A loud dork that works for SeraCorp Security

characters.name: Agent Ezekiel "Zeke" Krazitz
characters.description: A quiet dork that works for SeraCorp Security

characters.name: Dr. Tohane Omori
characters.description: A dorky scientist that works for SeraCorp Medical

characters.name: Layla Omorose
characters.description: Matriarch of the Omorose Vampire Coven.

characters.name: Badru Omorose
characters.description: Patriarch of the Omorose Vampire Coven.

characters.name: Adele
characters.description: A former member of the Omorose Vampire Coven, now blacklisted due to breaking the Sanguine Pact.

characters.name: Adder
characters.description: A member of the Omorose Vampire Coven.

characters.name: Lily
characters.description: A proprietor of a magic shop that isn't what she seems...
